Scripts.OnEnter: if not (GetCursorInfo() or BindPadCore.drag.type) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(BINDPAD_TOOLTIP_CREATE_MACRO) end

Scripts.OnMouseWheel: if delta > 0 then BindPadBindFrame_OnKeyDown(self, "MOUSEWHEELUP") else BindPadBindFrame_OnKeyDown(self, "MOUSEWHEELDOWN") end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if not InCombatLockdown() then self:SetAttribute("macrotext", BindPadMacroFrameText:GetText()) end
